21544.「リウ老師……。\n そなたは いったい どこにいるのじゃ……。: Master Liu... where in the world are you?

21545.「う～む……。そうやって ぼんやりしながら\n 一日中 何もしねえ アンタは\n:
Well... you're the most useless person in the
history of the world, aren't you?

21546.「よしッ！ 決定ッ！\n アンタ ポツコン３号ッ！: Yes! It's decided! You are Junkey #3!

21547.「ポツコン３号？ よく わからぬが……\n おぬし 今 余を 役立たずと申したな:
Junkey #3? I don't know... but you just called
me useless! How rude! In this day and age,
it'd be your head saying something like that!

21548.「このような時代に 来ることがなければ\n 余は 今ごろ たいそうな技術を\n:
Had it not been for the coming of these times,
I would have by now been taught a great deal
of skill by Master Liu!

21549.「そうじゃ！ リウ老師は 言っておった！\n 余が 成人した あかつきには\n:
Yes! Master Liu said! He said that when I
reach adulthood, he will teach me a very
special skill!

21550.「あのときの約束さえ 果たされていたら……: If only that promise had been fulfilled.

21552.「よかった！ <pc> ここに いたのね。\n あなたが ガラクタ城にいるって\:
Thank God! <pc> There you are. I
heard from a person in town that you were in
Junk Castle, and I had to rush over!

21553.「カルサドラ火山で 大変なことが起きてるの！:
Something terrible is happening at Calsadora
Volcano!

21554.「火山を調査している 学者さんの話によると\n 魔物の大群が 火山に押し寄せて\:
The scientists who are investigating the volcano say that hordes of monsters have been pouring into the volcano and performing some
sort of ritual!

21556.「え……。な…なに この子……？\n お父さん また 子供を拾ってきたの？:
What... what is she...? Father, did you pick
up another child?

21557.「今の話は 本当よ。\n 私も 遠巻きにだけど 鳥っぽい魔物が\n 火口付近に集:
What you just said is true. I saw a bird-like
monster gathering near the crater from a
distance with my own eyes.

21558.「<pc>よ 聞いたかえ！？\n グルヤンラシュじゃ！\n ついに きゃつが 動:
<pc>, did you hear that? Guryan Rush!
At last, the cat's out of the bag!

21559.「グ…グルヤン……？ 何 それ？: G... g... gul yan...? What's that?

21560.「くわしく 説明している時間はない！\n カルサドラ火山こそ きゃつの新たな根城:
I don't have time to go into detail! Calsadora
Volcano is the new stronghold of the kyats!
It's obvious they're hatching a plot there!

21561.「あなたの言っていることは\n よく わからないけど……。\n 不吉な予感がする:
I don't know what you're talking about but it
sure sounds ominous.

21562.「だから すぐにでも 火口付近に行って\n あやしい儀式を 止めたいんだけど……:
So I'd like to go to the crater right away and
stop the weird ritual, but... unless I can
fly, I can't go there.

21563.「ねえ！ <pc> お願い！\n カルサドラ火山の 火口付近に行く方法を\n 私:
Hey! <pc> Please! Would you please
join me in finding a way to get near the
crater of Calsadora Volcano?<yesno><close>

21564.「そう言わずに お願いよ！\n 私 ひとりでは 間に合わないかもしれないわ！\n:
Don't say that. Please! I might not be able to
make it on my own! There are already quite a
few monsters here!

21565.「ありがとう <pc>！\n 外から 火口付近に行くのは ムリみたいだから\n:
Thank you ! Well, it looks like we can't get to the crater from the outside, so let's see if we can't get to it from inside
the volcano!

21566.「溶岩の流れる洞くつを 進むことになるけど\n ほかに方法が 思いつかないわ！\:
We're going to have to go through a cave with
flowing lava, and I don't know how else to get
there! Well, I'll just go ahead!

21568.「溶岩の流れる洞くつを行くなど みすみす\n 死ににいくようなものじゃ。そなたの:
To walk through a cave of flowing lava is like
walking into death. Why would a sweet maiden
like you risk it all?

21569.「私たちの世界が 危険にさらされてるのよ？\n 私たちの手で なんとかするのが当:
Our world is in danger. We have to take
matters into our own hands.

21571.「……そうか。\n じゃがな どれだけ そなたが がんばっても\n カルサドラ火:
I see. But no matter how hard you try, you
will never reach the crater of Calsadora
Volcano!

21572.「カルサドラ火山の火口……。\n そこは かつて ガテリア皇国の民が\n 儀式に:
The crater of Calsadora Volcano... was once a sacred place used by the people of the Imperial Kingdom of Gateria for their
ceremonies.

21573.「そのため 他国の者が 火口に立ち入らぬよう\n 徒歩で行ける道は すべて封じた:
Therefore, they closed all roads that could be
reached on foot so that people from other
countries could not enter the crater.

21574.「なんですって！？\n そんなことをしたら その儀式にだって\n みんな 行けな:
What? If you do that, we can't even go to that
ceremony!

21575.「ふっふっふ。心配には及ばぬ。\n なぜならば……: Phew. No need to worry. Because...

21576.「ガテリアの民は 道を封じる前に\n 火口への転送装置を 作っておいたからな！:
Because Gateria's people built a transporter
to the crater before they blocked the road!

21577.「火口への転送装置？\n そんなモノが……。:
A transporter to the crater? There's such a
thing...

21578.「転送装置は 技術的には高度なものだが\n 作り自体は単純なものである！ あれな:
The transporter is technologically advanced,
but simple in construction! It could work in
this day and age!

21579.「よしッ！ それでは <pc>よ！\n 転送装置を動かす 起動器具……\n 三闘:
Okay! Now then! Bring me the activation device
that will activate the transporter... the
Triad Axe!

21581.「……コホン。<pc>よ。もったいぶらずに\n 持ってくるのじゃ。三闘士のオノく:
...ahem. <pc>. Don't be extravagant
and bring it here. We have Triad Axes in these
days, don't we?<yesno><close>

21582.「なに言ってんですッ！ 元ポツコン２号ッ！\n そんな名前のもん うちには ねえ:
What are you talking about, Ex-Junkey #2?!
We don't have anything by that name! I've
never seen or heard of it!

21583.「な なんじゃとッ！？\n 三闘士のオノすら この時代には\n ないと申すかッ！:
What the hell? You say that even the Triad Axe
is not available in this age!

21584.「なんということじゃ……。\n たったひとつの道が 断たれてしもうた……。\n:
My God... the only path has been cut off...
and now it's over...

21586.「なに あきらめてるのよ！？\n ないなら 作ればいいじゃない！:
What are you giving up on? If you don't have
it, just make it!

21587.「さ 三闘士のオノを作るじゃと？\n 単純な作りのものゆえ 作れるかもしれぬが\:
So, you want to make a Triad Axe? It may be
possible to make one, but I've never heard of
making one myself.

21588.「できるかもしれないことは\n あきらめずに やってみるのよ。\n 道を 切りひ:
Don't give up on what you think you can do.
That's the only way to open the way.

21590.「さあ そのオノのこと くわしく教えて。\n 今 頼れるのは それを知ってる\n:
Tell me more about that axe. You're the only
one I can rely on right now, since you're the
only one who knows about it.

21591.「う うむ。それでは……\n そちたちにも 三闘士のオノを作るため\n 手伝って:
Ummm.... Well then... let's get you guys to
help me make the Triad Axe.

21592.「<pc>。そちは 魔導の歯車と\n 古代の戦刃というモノを 手に入れてまいれ。:
<pc>. You must get your hands on a
Magic Gear and an Ancient Blade. Both of these
materials are indispensable for making axes.

21593.「よいか？ 魔導の歯車は <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>。\n 古代の戦刃は:
Good? The Magic Gear is from Green Scissors.
The Ancient Blade may be dropped by defeating
Genji Beetles.

21594.「ひとまず その ふたつさえあれば\n 三闘士のオノの原型が できるはずじゃ。\:
With those two things for the time being, we
should be able to make a prototype of the
Triad Axe. What do you think? Will you do it?

21595.「うむ！ ふたつの材料を手に入れたら\n ガラクタ城に 戻ってくるのじゃぞ。:
Mm! You will return to Junk Castle when you
have received the two ingredients.

21596.「そなたは <pc>が帰ってくるまで\n ここで 余の手伝いをしてたもれ。\n:
You can help me here until <pc> comes
back. I need to make some preparations before
I can make the axe.

21597.「余に 三闘士のオノが作れるかは わからぬ。\n ……だが そなたの言うように\:
I do not know if I can make a Triad Axe. But
as you say, I will try, believing in my own
strength.

21598.「うん。お願いね。\n 私たちも 信じてるよ。:
Yeah, I'll do it. Please. We believe in you,
too.

21599.「不思議な子ね。\n 火山のことや 昔のことを知ってたりして。\n でも そのお:
You're a curious girl. She knows about
volcanoes and the past. But it saved my life.

21600.「それじゃ <pc>。\n 三闘士のオノを みんなで作りましょう！:
Well then <pc>. Let's all make Triad
Axes together!

21601.「<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>と <%sEV_QUE_NAME1>は\n ど:
Both the Green Scissors and the Genji Beetle
appear in the Molinara Forest.

21602.「……ムムッ！\n そちは 下々の者の依頼を たくさん抱えており\n 余の頼みは:
Mwah! It seems that you have too many requests
from the lower ranks to accept my request.

21603.「……残念じゃが 仕方がない。\n ほかの依頼を片付けたら 余を手伝ってたもれ。:
I'm sorry, but it can't be helped. You can
help me when you're done with the other
requests. I'm counting on you!

21604.「……なんと！ 余が やる気を出したというに\n そちは 手を貸してくれぬと申す:
What! I've been motivated, and you refuse to
help me! I've failed you, <pc>!

21605.「とはいえ 頼れるのは そちしか おらぬ。\n そう言わずに 手を貸してくれぬか:
However, you are the only one I can rely on.
Don't say that and lend me a hand. I'll be
here. Come again.

21606.「おお <pc>よ！\n 転送装置を動かす 三闘士のオノを作るため\n 余の手伝:
Oh, <pc>! Are you ready to help me
make the Triad Axe that will power the
transporter?

21607.「グルヤンラシュが 謀り事をめぐらす\n カルサドラ火山の 火口付近に行くには\:
There is no way to get to the crater of Calsadora Volcano, where Guryan Rush is plotting and scheming, except by using an
ancient transporter.

21608.「三闘士のオノを作るために 必要な材料は\n 魔導の歯車と 古代の戦刃の ふたつ:
The two materials needed to make the Triad Axe
are the Magic Gear and the Ancient Blade. I
want you to gather these.

21609.「よいか？ 魔導の歯車は <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>。\n 古代の戦刃は:
Good? The Magic Gear is from Green Scissors.
The Ancient Blade may be dropped by defeating
Genji Beetles.

21610.「ひとまず その ふたつさえあれば\n 三闘士のオノの原型が できるはずじゃ。\:
With those two things for the time being, we
should be able to make a prototype of the
Triad Axe. What do you think? Will you do it?

21611.「グルヤンラシュが 謀り事をめぐらす\n カルサドラ火山の 火口付近に行くには\:
There is no way to get to the crater of Calsadora Volcano, where Guryan Rush is plotting and scheming, except by using an
ancient transporter.

21612.「その転送装置を動かす 三闘士のオノを作るため\n そちには 魔導の歯車と 古代:
In order to make the Triad Axe that will power
the transporter, I need you to gather two
materials, a Magic Gear and an Ancient Blade.

21613.「よいか？ 魔導の歯車は <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>。\n 古代の戦刃は:
Good? The Magic Gear is from Green Scissors.
The Ancient Blade may be dropped by defeating
Genji Beetles.

21614.「ふたつの材料を手に入れたら\n ガラクタ城に 戻ってきてたもれ。\n 余は そ:
When you receive the two materials, come back
to Junk Castle. I'll make other preparations
until then.

21615.「<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>と <%sEV_QUE_NAME1>は\n ど:
Both the Green Scissors and the Genji Beetle
appear in the Molinara Forest.

21616.「おお <pc>よ！\n よくぞ 戻った！\n 頼んだ品は 手に入れてきたかえ？:
Oh, <pc>! Welcome back! Did you
receive what you asked for?

21617.ビャン・ダオに\n魔導の歯車と 古代の戦刃を 渡しますか？<yesno><clo:
Would you give Byan Dao the Magic Gear and the
Ancient Blade?<yesno><close>

21618.「これこれ <pc>。\n 余は そちの おちょくりに興じるほど\n ヒマを 持:
This and that <pc>. I don't have time
for your teasing, do I?

21619.<pc>は ビャン・ダオに\n魔導の歯車と 古代の戦刃を 渡した！:
<pc> hands Byan Dao the Magic Gear
and the Ancient Cog!

21620.「うむ！ これじゃ これじゃ！\n 大儀であったな <pc>よ！\n さあ ほう:
Mm! This, this! Well done, <pc>!
Now, you will receive your reward!

21621.「……では 転送装置の起動器具\n 三闘士のオノを 作ってみるとしよう。:
So, let's try to make a transporter activation
device, the Triad Axe.

21622.「ダストン殿。\n ここにある物を 使ってもよいかの？: Mr. Duston. May I use something here?

21623.「なっ！ ここにあるのは どれも役に立たねえ\n ガラクタばかりでごぜえますッ！:
Nah! All of this is useless junk! That's not
going to happen even if we tried to use them!

21624.「ふふふ…… 何を申すか。ここにある物からは\n 失われた文明の息吹を 感じるぞ:
Hmmm... what can I say? I can feel the breath
of a lost civilization in these objects.
Perfect for the parts of the Triad Axe.

21625.「はじめて出会ったときは\n うす汚れた ただの貧民かと思ったが……。\n ダス:
When I first met him, I thought he was just a
poor man with a dirty face... but Duston, you
are a man with a very good eye.

21626.「や…やめてくだせえ！\n ほめられるようなことをした覚えはねえですッ！\n 使:
Stop it! I don't remember doing anything to be
praised! If you can use it, use it!

21627.「よし！ それでは リウ老師直伝の技術で\n この物たちに 命を吹き込み\n 三:
Yes! Then let us use the skills handed down by
Master Liu to bring these objects to life and
transform them into Triad Axes!

21628.「……というわけで <pc>よ。\n オノの完成まで 少し時間が かかるじゃろう:
So, <pc>. It will take me a little
while to finish the axe. Please come back
after a while.

21629.「がんばってね ビャンくん。\n あなたなら きっと できるよ！: Good luck, Byan. I'm sure you can do it!

21631.「さっきから 気になっていたんだけど\n あなた いったい 何者？\n どうして:
I've been wondering... who the hell are you?
How do you know so much about the past?

21633.「信じていた父に 見捨てられ……\n 復讐にしか 生き場所を求められぬ\n あわ:
Abandoned by the father he trusted, a poor Man
Who Lived only for revenge.
